definition: (classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Now 'we just want to keep the momentum going, ' he said.
sentences.chinese: 劉海平稱，現在我們只想繼續保持這個良好勢頭。

sentences.english: I'd like to shorten my bangs down to touch my eyebrows.
sentences.chinese: 我想把劉海剪到眉毛的位置。

sentences.english: A lock of hair had fallen down over her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 一綹劉海遮住她的雙眼。

sentences.english: Luminescent amber eyes were fringed with long, dark lashes.
sentences.chinese: 琥珀色的眼睛，在長黑的劉海下，閃爍光芒。

sentences.english: The girl wore her hair in a fringe.
sentences.chinese: 那個女孩子額前梳着劉海。

sentences.english: Ask your stylist to make the corner edge of your bangs rounded on one side.
sentences.chinese: 請你的髮型師把劉海調整到一邊兒。

sentences.english: Sculpture the fringe in low angle.
A clipper-built radian is cut in thick bang.
sentences.chinese: 在厚劉海中剪出流線型的弧度。

sentences.english: No bangs, big eyes, thick eyebrows.
sentences.chinese: 沒劉海，眼睛較大，眉毛濃。

sentences.english: Section your bangs when your hair is wet before blow-drying.
sentences.chinese: 打溼劉海，在吹乾前分好。

sentences.english: Liu Haisu Art Museum boasts an excellent professional service system.
sentences.chinese: 劉海粟美術館擁有良好的專業服務系統。

sentences.english: Isn't it about time Jane visited her hairdresser? Her bangs are hanging all over her face now.
sentences.chinese: 簡該去理髮了吧？她的劉海兒都垂到臉上了。

sentences.english: The girl with the dark hair and the bangs.
sentences.chinese: 那個黑頭髮有劉海的女孩。

sentences.english: Also, people with dry hair are more suited to having see-through bangs.
sentences.chinese: 另外，乾性髮質的人更適合剪空氣劉海。

sentences.english: When dry, mist your fringe with a lightweight hair spray.
sentences.chinese: 劉海乾了後，用一款輕薄的噴發定型劑噴在上面定型。

sentences.english: She brushed away the 28)bangs hiding my eyes and then pulled me against her breast.
sentences.chinese: 她撥開遮着我眼睛的劉海兒，一把將我摟進懷裏。

definition: Mawei district of Fuzhou city 福州市[Fu2 zhou1 shi4], Fujian
ponytail (hairstyle)/horse's tail/slender fibers like horse's tail (applies to various plants)
one head/a head full of sth/one end (of a stick)/one side/headlong/directly/rapidly/simultaneously
beard/mustache or whiskers/facial hair/CL:撮[zuo3],根[gen1]/(coll.) bandit
to scald/to burn (by scalding)/to blanch (cooking)/to heat (sth) up in hot water/to perm/to iron/scalding hot
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
